name: Sphere Cubix
description:
Movement is the drive for this game...

Players Play as a sphere with unbalanced velocity and slightly of controls,

With a simple design language, this game is not easy to play, jus to be warned, your skills are earned not given, anyone up for  a challenge in a simplistic yet atmospheric world can play along and get frustrated..

Known Issues (might not be the same for everyone):

The jump output seems to differ from my Mac Build to my Windows Build :(

There is currently no pause menu yet (Soon To Be Added)
